column1: EVTDESC_EMP.1;It is the Emperor's duty to create a strong and prosperous lineage. Will you visit your harem tonight?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.2;The Emperor has chosen to visit the Harem. You must choose the girl he spends the night with.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.4;A suitable partner has been chosen for you tonight.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

EVTDESC_EMP.6;[From.GetOnlyDynastyName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] pleased the Inner Court's examiners. She now resides in the capital's palace. We stand to benefit if she gains the Emperor's favor.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.7;[From.GetOnlyDynastyName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] failed to please the Inner Court's examiners. She remains in your court.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.9;Now that we have seized the throne
column2: we have the option of adopting Confucianism
column3: thereby continuing the Chinese Dynastic system.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC_EMP.10;The Chancellor has overthrown the Emperor! This will certainly lead to chaos and confusion. Does he have designs on forming a new dynasty?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.11;The Emperor has called for recommendations for office! We have three months to send candidates.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.12;The lords of the realm have sent their candidates. It's time to pick out the best ones...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.14;[From.GetOnlyDynastyName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] was successful in the exams. His work will surely help our interest...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.15;[From.GetOnlyDynastyName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] failed in the exams. He remains under your hospitality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.16;The time has come for us to collect taxes. How do you want to handle this year's commitments?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.17;The Emperor has requested taxes for the year. How do you want to handle this year's commitments?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.18;The Emperor has requested tribute for the year. How do you want to handle this year's commitments?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.19;The Emperor has waived taxes for the year. Take advantage of this reprieve.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.20;Your Imperial tribute was waylaid en route to the capital! The emperor will be disappointed...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESCA_EMP.21;The Imperial court is far away. The true way lies within our own understandings. We shall cast off the yoke of Confucianism and embrace local traditions instead!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESCB_EMP.21;The emperor is no emperor of mine. From now on I shall rule myself. My house. My money. My way.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.22;A regional lord of significant renown has humbly offered their holdings up to the Emperor's disposal. What shall we tell them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.23;The Emperor has accepted our offer!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.24;The Emperor has declined our offer...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.25A;The Inner Court has requested their annual salary. Will you pay them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.25B;The Eunuchs have requested their annual salary. Will you pay them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.26;The Inner Court has accepted your request!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_EMP.27;The Inner Court has declined our request...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
